  • Packages that use LocalizationException 
    Package Description
    chav1961.purelib.i18n
    This package contains description of Pure Library internationalization classes.
    chav1961.purelib.i18n.interfaces
    This package contains description of locale-specific interfaces and annotations.
    chav1961.purelib.ui
    This package contains a set of classes to use in the UI-oriented applications.
    chav1961.purelib.ui.interfacers
    This package contains a set of interfaces and enumerations to use in the UI-oriented applications.
    chav1961.purelib.ui.swing
